data.description:
This is the third re-write of Mobile VR Station and was based upon the successful iOS/Android versions, but re-imagined to work only in VR.  The player has been built from the ground up to display 2D & 3D content on various projections such as Plane, Spherical, Dome, Full Dome, Curved and EAC.

The player will continue in its freemium tradition and allows you to try all features before buying.  The only limitation of the free version is it will only play the first five minutes of any video, but you are free to make sure it works with your content and has all the needed features at your leisure.  We offer support on our Facebook page if you have any questions and links are available inside the app to our various pages, online tutorials and the extensive help guide.

changelog.change_log: Added link to VR Lad, added a plea for V63 update
Added in the new Follow profile option.  Added in a new Eye mode to exit when looking away.  Rotation fixes for various aspects.  RSS Feed support.
Adding in the Welcome Screen, it will popup when a new version is installed, it has a few tips.  Added more notices.
Latest changes from ported edition
Latest fixes dein criss platform updates.  Updated icons.  Fixed a few visual issues.
Re-organized code base.  Added in basic tour support.  Added in more finger actions.
Fixing a issue with detecting installed games
Fixing an issue with Passthrough and DLNA/UPNP access
Added in new Cyber City background.  Updated previous backgrounds with extra bits and better shadows.
Fixed a visual bug with "Some Rooms".  Updated the locations objects can pop out of "Old House".
Added in a new background and updated another with lighting.  Fixed a background issue.
Added a new background.
Added a new Configuration Wizard to help smooth over configuration woes
Fixes for Text Editor being soo far away.  Added in multi-line copy,cut and paste.  Other modding fixes and extra links.
Adding in support to test/verify more parts of the system
Switching back to v49 SDK, so it should work on older devices again
Switching everything to API level 32 fort Quest 2, Menu fixes
New Internal Folder, Updated Text, New Menu Adjustments, Latest SDK
Better Scoped Storage support, Copy, Paste.  Better safety rails.  Support for non-standard zip files.  Some graphic changes.  Added Shameless shilling
Support for one click modding
